dimensions: Warp x Weft: 309 x 99 cm (10 ft. 1 5/8 in. x 39 in.)
title: Sarong
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave; mordant printing and painting, resist printing for reds and black; yellow possibly applied by brush; blue process unknown
description: Field is a small scale overall diamond lattice enclosing a torso of a temple figure on a blue background; side borders are floral patterns; end borders four pendant bands on  red, rose and blue.
name: Sarong
